title: The Future of JavaScript
description: A deep dive into the latest features and upcoming changes in JavaScript.

title: Building Scalable APIs with Node.js
description: Learn how to design and build robust and scalable APIs using Node.js and Express.

title: CSS Grid and Flexbox for Modern Layouts
description: Master the power of CSS Grid and Flexbox to create complex and responsive web layouts with ease.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning with Python
description: Get started with machine learning using Python and popular libraries like Scikit-learn and TensorFlow.

title: Securing Your Web Applications
description: Learn about common web security vulnerabilities and how to protect your applications from attacks.

title: The Rise of Serverless Computing
description: Explore the world of serverless computing and learn how to build and deploy applications without managing servers.
